title: Ticket #4590: Improve diagnostic output of JobRouter
description:
The dprintf output of the condor_job_router (and therefore also the condor_job_router_tool) could use some re-formatting in order to make it easier to see what is going on.

Also it should show all of the routes that match a given candidate job, and not just the route chosen.

This ticket is related to #4569. Use this ticket for master branch changes and #4569 for stable branch changes.
check_ins: 2014-Sep-16 11:21   Check-in [41166]: improve diagnostic output of condor_job_router #4590 GetCandidateJobs now prints a table of routes and jobs and shows all routes matching a job (when in tool mode). (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
